img_above_text:
![Wukong UpperHollow 34.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/2d/Wukong_UpperHollow_34.jpg)
Grab the green Wisp on this side of the broken bridge, and then look past the Shrine for a small passageway full of -- you guessed it -- hanging cocoons.
img_below_text:
Carefully carve a path through the Clawed Cocoons to reach the other side, and you'll find yourself in a large chamber with an even bigger cocoon hanging down from the middle. Something angry is muttering to itself inside, and its apparently waiting for you.
## Boss Fight - Venom Daoist

img_summary: The image depicts a tense and atmospheric scene within a dark chamber filled with hanging cocoons. A character, likely the protagonist, stands ready with a flaming staff, suggesting preparation for an impending confrontation. The narrative context indicates that the protagonist is about to engage in a boss fight with the Venom Daoist, who is hidden within a large cocoon, muttering ominously. The setting and character posture convey a sense of anticipation and danger, highlighting the upcoming challenge in the game "Black Myth: Wukong."
